story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_02: What have you done to him?!
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_03: Quick, we have to do something to help!
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_06:
Don’t waste your time. I will never succumb to
your nightmares.
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_08:
Splendid, Master Cyrus! You’ve made that
Pokémon submit to you!
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_09: Master Cyrus, what would you like to do next?
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_12: This Darkrai is a Mythical Pokémon.
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_13:
It sends others into a deep slumber and shows
them nightmares.
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_14: And now, it’s under my command.
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_15:
Combined with the strength you all lend me, we
can now create the ideal world we’ve always
dreamed of!
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_17: Team Galactic is the best! Long live Master Cyrus!
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_18:
In order to carry out our plans, I’m thinking of
using sync stones.
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_20:
They are stones that allow sync pairs to use
tremendous power.
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_21:
We must learn more about these stones—and
about the sygna suit outfits that certain sync pairs
seem to favor.
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_22:
That said, I have no intent of relying on a
connection between hearts.
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_23:
Instead, we will prove that technology is
capable of drawing out the full power of
these sync stones!
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_25: In that nightmare Darkrai showed me...
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_26:
There was a world of solitude—of
never-ending darkness.
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_27: A world without spirit...devoid of joy or despair.
story_teamgalactic_01_02000/2401_1201_28: That is the ideal world I’ve been searching for.
